alert.note: Alert for Upper Santa Cruz River and Altar Valleys including Nogales (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 3:35PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Pima and north central Santa Cruz Counties through 415 PM MST... At 335 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Green Valley, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Sahuarita, Green Valley, East Sahuarita, Corona De Tucson, Amado and Arivaca Junction. This includes the following highways... Interstate 19 between mile markers 28 and 47. Route 83 near mile marker 47. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Upper Santa Cruz River and Altar Valleys including Nogales
